disclaimer.title: DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.error:
Status not success, error.
Servers might be unavailable.
disclaimer.offline: Are you trying to play an online game offline?
options.other.gameplay.desc:
The game changed a lot almost last minute.
Some people prefer the old gameplay.
options.other.wavybg.title: WAVY BACKGROUND
options.other.wavybg.desc: When it's pizza time, the background distorts intensly.
options.other.wavybg.locked: shit graphics mode on. This option is locked.
options.other.wavybg.shaderfail:
Shaders not compiled.
Please restart the game.
options.other.blur.title: MOTION BLUR
options.other.blur.desc: When it's pizza time, the whole screen has motion blur.
options.other.shaky.title: ESCAPE SHAKE
options.other.shaky.desc: When it's pizza time, the screen shakes.
options.other.panicbg.title: ESCAPE BACKGROUND
options.other.panicbg.desc: When it's pizza time, the background can change.
options.other.afterimage.title: FANCY AFTERIMAGES
options.other.afterimage.desc:
Applies the current palette to the afterimages.
Might lag the game.
options.other.demo3.title: FANCY DEBRIS
options.other.demo3.desc: Secret debris will have their respective tiles.
options.other.playernames.title: SHOW NAMES
options.other.playernames.desc: Show other people's usernames in gameplay.
options.other.chatbubbles.title: CHAT BUBBLES
options.other.chatbubbles.desc: Conveniently show other people's last message.
options.other.onlinepvp.title: PVP
options.other.onlinepvp.desc: Attack other players. The other player will need PVP enabled too.
options.other.synceffects.title: SYNC EFFECTS
options.other.synceffects.desc: In online mode, sync effects like afterimages or taunt.
options.other.fuckoffptd.title: STREAMER MODE
options.other.fuckoffptd.desc: Should replace most player names with their respective IDs.
options.other.drpc.title: RICH PRESENCE
options.other.drpc.desc: Show some fancy stuff in your Discord status.
options.other.fpscount.title: FPS COUNTER
options.other.fpscount.desc: A simple FPS counter at the bottom right of the screen.
manual.welcome: Welcome to the Pizza Tower Online manual!
manual.controls.content:
You can see and change the controls in the options,
but there are extra controls exclusive to the mod:

- T to open the chat
- ENTER to begin typing and again to send a message
- ESCAPE to exit the chat, if it's open
manual.commands.content:
There are some commands that can be used in chat:

/list - Lists all players that are currently in-game
/t - Toggles a mini-chat in the bottom left corner of the screen
/ping - Pongs you back
/dance - Dance
manual.rules.content: Of course, every online game has rules to follow:
manual.rules.content2:
- Don't spam (1 minute auto-mute)
- Don't swear
    (the word will change to *** for others)
- Don't mod the game
- When recording footage, please enable
  streamer mode in the OTHER OPTIONS menu
